title: How to Understand Your Users Better and Deliver a Top-Tier Experience with Custom Properties
title1: How to Understand Your Users Better and Deliver a Top-Tier Experience with Custom Properties - Helicone
title2: How to Understand Your Users Better and Deliver a Top-Tier Experience with Custom Properties - Helicone
description: Discover how Helicone's Custom Properties can help you harness user data to grow your business. Learn about environment tracking, user segmentation, and real-world applications from companies like Journalist AI and Greptile. Unlock insights to tailor your services and drive growth.
author: Lina Lam
